P. Hydras::

"I like it, mylord"replied the male"But, how coult we do that while 
we deal with a massive trouble named Unicron?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Lord Vykos smiled evilly at Hydras' use of proper titles.
> 
> Vykos: Please Hydras, sit down for now.
> 
> He clapped his hands and a smaller chair simply unfolded from the 
> floor.
> 
> Vykos: I am here because of the Maximals. You should know by now 
that 
> those pretentious Tripredacus have taken Cybertron and control it 
> with an Iron Fist. The refugees of the war, both Maximals and 
> Predacons, fled to Earth and tried to work together. Fools they 
are! 
> They simply deny their true nature as heirs to the Decepticons!
> 
> He looked at Hydras straight in his eyes.
> 
> Vykos: We have to let news of Maximal failures reach Modern day 
> Earth. We have to show our lost brothers that only they hold the 
keys 
> to the future! However, I have only limited manpower. Even though 
> Warghoul is powerful, he cannot do things alone. What do you think 
of 
> my little plan?
> 
> Meanwhile, Warghoul identified the new Megatron. He gathered all 
the 
> informations he could with a thorough scan and compiled it in his 
> hard drive.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Puppet Hydras::
> > 
> > Puppet Hydras go inside and waited that Vykos let him sat 
> > down "Well... Milord, "said Hydras while he adopted a more 
polite 
> > tone"what do you wish speak with me?"
